items.headline: Why Boeing’s commercial-airplanes business had another large loss even as revenue surged
items.summary_en: Airplane deliveries rose and revenue surged while Boeing’s defense and space business showed strength. But losses were wider than expected.

items.headline: Caterpillar’s stock surges to a record after a big revenue beat and a surprisingly upbeat outlook

items.headline: All five of his hedge funds have doubled this year. What this manager is saying now about gold and tech.
items.summary_en: Through the end of September, Crescat’s five funds have soared in value. The firm that’s bullish on gold hasn’t been deterred by a recent slide in the yellow metal.

items.headline: Apple earnings need to resolve this major investor question

items.headline: Nvidia could become the first $5 trillion company today. Here’s just how big that is.
items.summary_en: A $5 trillion market capitalization would be larger than the combined market values of Broadcom, TSMC, AMD, ASML, Micron, Lam Research, Qualcomm, Intel and Arm.

items.headline: Mercedes CEO says carmaker is scurrying for chips after Nexperia nationalization
items.summary_en: The chief executive of Mercedes said the luxury automaker is “scurrying” around looking for alternatives after a key microchip maker was caught in the geopolitical crossfire between the U.S. and China.
